com.github.i49.hibiscus.validation

Interface JsonValidator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicJsonValidator

    public interface JsonValidator
    A central interface to be used to validate JSON documents against specified schema. An implementation of this interface is provided by BasicJsonValidator class.

    This interface provides three variations of the methods to validate input JSON documents.

    1. A method to read JSON documents from Reader.
    2. A method to read JSON documents from InputStream with character encoding specified explicitly.
    3. A method to read JSON documents from InputStream with character encoding determined automatically.

    The following sample code shows how to validate the JSON document read from Reader.

    
 JsonValidator validator = ...;
 ValidationResult result = null; 
 try (Reader reader = new FileReader("person.json")) {
   result = validator.validate(reader);
 }

    The following sample code shows how to validate the JSON document read from InputStream with character encoding specified.

    
 JsonValidator validator = ...;
 ValidationResult result = null; 
 try (InputStream stream = Files.newInputStream(Paths.get("person.json")) {
   result = validator.validate(stream, StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
 }

    If the input JSON document is turned to be not well-formed, in other words, broken as a JSON document, all validation methods will throw JsonParsingException immediately in the middle of the validation. Otherwise the validation methods will complete the validation until reaching the end of the document and return ValidationResult even when the input JSON document has some errors against the given schema. The final result of the validation can be inspected through ValidationResult returned from the validation methods.

    See Also:
    BasicJsonValidator, ValidationResult

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Schema getSchema()
      Returns the schema against which this validator verifies JSON documents.
      ValidationResult validate(InputStream stream)
      Validates a JSON document which is to be read from InputStream.
      ValidationResult validate(InputStream stream, Charset charset)
      Validates a JSON document which is to be read from InputStream with specific character encoding.
      ValidationResult validate(Reader reader)
      Validates a JSON document which is to be read from Reader.

    • Method Detail

      • getSchema

        Schema getSchema()
        Returns the schema against which this validator verifies JSON documents.
        Returns:
        the schema assigned to this validator.

      • validate

        ValidationResult validate(Reader reader)
        Validates a JSON document which is to be read from Reader.
        Parameters:
        reader - the reader from which the JSON document is to be read.
        Returns:
        the validation result containing the JSON values and the problems detected in the process of the validation.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if reader is null.
        JsonException - if I/O error occurred while reading the document.
        JsonParsingException - if JSON document is not well-formed.

      • validate

        ValidationResult validate(InputStream stream)
        Validates a JSON document which is to be read from InputStream. The character encoding of the stream is determined as specified in RFC 4627.
        Parameters:
        stream - the byte stream from which the JSON document is to be read.
        Returns:
        the validation result containing the JSON values and the problems detected in the process of the validation.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if stream is null.
        JsonException - if encoding cannot be determined or I/O error occurred while reading the document.
        JsonParsingException - if JSON document is not well-formed.
        See Also:
        RFC 4627: The application/json Media Type for JavaScript Object Notation (JSON)

      • validate

        ValidationResult validate(InputStream stream,
                          Charset charset)
        Validates a JSON document which is to be read from InputStream with specific character encoding.
        Parameters:
        stream - the byte stream from which the JSON document is to be read.
        charset - the character set to be used to decode bytes into characters.
        Returns:
        the validation result containing the JSON values and the problems detected in the process of the validation.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if one of arguments is null.
        JsonException - if I/O error occurred while reading the document.
        JsonParsingException - if JSON document is not well-formed.
